name: Nextstop
overview:
Nextstop’s members share recommendations for the places they love most all over the world, with the goal that wherever you are, nextstop can help you can find something great to do. It features short, positive recommendations, with photos, maps, and factual information about all the places in the system.

Nextstop is useful when you are close to home or somewhere new. You can find a new place to go to dinner, plan a weekend away, find something nearby when you’re on a business trip, or plan a vacation. You can discover places to visit and things to do by browsing to different locations through search, or simply browsing friends’ recommendations to see what strikes your fancy.

Each recommendation comes with a brief snippet of text from the person recommending the place. nextstop encourages people to keep these snippets short so that you don’t have to go paging through volumes of reviews to understand what a place is about.

acquisition.source_description: Facebook Acquires Social Travel Recommendation Site Nextstop
